conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway: extruded walls with thickness, visible interior volumes, and an elevated angled camera with ceiling/roof removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and readable 3D corner junctions; angled view is appropriate; cutaway is generally clean though some perimeter/exterior transitions feel simplified.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall apartment layout (bedrooms, living/dining center, kitchen/utility, multiple toilets, office/maid room) matches well, but exterior spaces (deck and balconies) shown in 2D are largely absent/simplified in 3D; openings (windows/doors) are not fully faithful.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture and fixtures are present (beds, sofa set, dining table, kitchen counters, bathroom elements, office desk) and placed in the expected rooms with mostly reasonable scale/orientation.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is readable with decent lighting and separation of walls/floors, but presentation has UI overlay contamination (play icon) and openings/material cues are somewhat minimal, reducing clarity of windows/doors.

detected_errors.description: Deck and balconies present in the 2D plan are missing or heavily simplified in the 3D model, reducing layout fidelity at the perimeter.
Doors/windows are simplified and several window placements/opening definitions are unclear compared to the 2D plan.
UI/play icon overlay present in the 3D image reduces presentation cleanliness.

summary: A true 3D cutaway with strong interior readability and mostly correct room arrangement, but with notable perimeter/layout omissions (deck/balconies) and simplified opening details.
